credits.question: How do I book a lesson?
credits.answer: Simple! Browse our teachers, pick your favorite, select an available time slot, and confirm with your credits.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel a lesson?
cancellation.answer: Yes! If you cancel more than 6 hours before the lesson starts, you get a full refund of your credits. Late cancellations are non-refundable to respect the teacher's time.

subscription.question: How do subscription plans work?
subscription.answer: Subscriptions give you a set number of lessons per month at a discounted rate. You choose a fixed weekly slot (e.g., every Monday at 8 PM) to build a consistent habit.

becomeMentor.question: How do I become a teacher?
becomeMentor.answer: Sign up as a Teacher, fill out your profile, and upload a short introduction video. Our team will review your application within 48 hours.

intro.title: Learn languages 1-1 with professional teachers
intro.description: Lingofys connects you with experienced language teachers from Japan, China, Philippines and many other places. Learn English, Chinese, Japanese flexibly according to your schedule with transparent payment and high quality experience.

step1.title: Sign up
step1.description: Create a free account as a Student (to learn languages) or Teacher (to teach languages).

step2.title: Search & Book
step2.description: Browse teachers, view profiles and reviews. Choose a suitable time and book a lesson in just a few clicks.

step3.title: Learn & Review
step3.description: Join online lessons via video call. After the lesson, rate the teacher to help the learning community.

payment.title: How payment works
payment.systemDescription: Lingofys uses an internal currency called Credit. You top up USD into your wallet and use Credits to pay for lessons.

step1.label: Step 1
step1.title: Top up
step1.description: Top up USD into wallet and receive corresponding Credits at current exchange rate.

step2.label: Step 2
step2.title: Book lesson
step2.description: Credits are held temporarily when you book, ensuring safe transactions.

step3.label: Step 3
step3.title: Complete
step3.description: After the lesson, Credits are transferred to the teacher. Teacher can withdraw to USD.

protection.title: Transaction protection
protection.description: Escrow system ensures student money is protected until lesson is completed, and teachers are paid in full after completing the work.
